on.update: brush_distance ? {unit: "child_distance_layer_0", intervals: [{encoding: "x", field: "distance", extent: brush_distance}]} : null
brush_delay ? {unit: "child_delay_layer_0", intervals: [{encoding: "x", field: "delay", extent: brush_delay}]} : null
brush_time ? {unit: "child_time_layer_0", intervals: [{encoding: "x", field: "time", extent: brush_time}]} : null
